#summary Introduction to SVG and Reference for SVG elements

Scalable Vector Graphics (SVG) is a markup for 2D graphical elements in your web pages.  See [SVGIntroduction Introduction to SVG].

== Basic Graphical Elements ==

|| Element || SVG Version || Deprecated || Obsolete || Browser ||
